author: Sameer Suri For Dailymail.Com
title: Cameron Diaz shows off pencil thin legs in skintight jeans | Daily Mail Online
text: Buy now Bright red lipstick clashed elegantly with her blonde hair, which largely fell free, though some of it had been wound into a braid. Her white top draped about her svelte torso and featured a sloping neckline that stopped just short of baring any cleavage. A large olive green bag dangled from her arm, and she held a cardboard coffee cup as well as her phone in her right hand. 90210 chic: The 44-year-old actress clashed bright red lipstick elegantly with her blonde hair, which largely fell free, though some of it had been wound into a braid Alighting: She'd been dropped off at her destination in a gleaming red car, sharing a laugh with the man behind the wheel as she clambered out onto the sidewalk Her stylish blazer matched her boots and featured sleeves that stopped halfway down her forearm, allowing her white top's sleeves to poke through. Tuesday evening, her husband Benji Madden, whom she married in 2015, was seen spotted heading out with his identical twin brother Joel Madden. Both wore black jackets - Benji's over a red and black checked shirt - as well as garnishing their outfits with black baseball caps. Joel at the wheel: Tuesday evening, her husband Benji Madden, whom she married in 2015, was seen spotted heading out with his identical twin brother Joel Madden Mirroring: Both wore black jackets - Benji's over a red and black checked shirt - as well as garnishing their outfits with black baseball caps The pair of them each had a celebrity Valentine that Valentine's Day, Joel having married Nicole Richie back in 2010. Before tying the knot, they had two children: a daughter called Harlow born in 2008 and a son called Sparrow born the following year. It was Richie who'd set up Diaz with her own Madden brother, as she conceded on Watch What Happens Live in 2014. Both taken: The pair of them each had a celebrity Valentine that Valentine's Day, Joel having married Nicole Richie back in 2010 How he met his bride: It was Richie who'd set up Diaz with her own Madden brother, as she conceded on Watch What Happens Live in 2014 The Madden brothers are frequent musical collaborators, most obviously by way of a double act that goes by The Madden Brothers. They're also co-members of the band Good Charlotte, of which Joel is the lead singer and Benji is a backing vocalist. On top of his singing contribution, Benji also serves as lead guitarist for Good Charlotte, which was cobbled together in 1995. The family that works together: The Madden brothers are frequent musical collaborators, most obviously by way of a double act that goes by The Madden Brothers Since 1995: They're also co-members of the band Good Charlotte, of which Joel is the lead singer and Benji is a backing vocalist and lead guitarist Share or comment on this article 347
